data.Sentence_cn: 我的朋友休一直很胖，但是近来情况变得越发糟糕，以致他决定节食。
data.Sentence: My friend, Hugh, has always been fat, but things got so bad recently that he decided to go on a diet.

data.Sentence_cn: 他是一星期前开始节食的。
data.Sentence: He began his diet a week ago.

data.Sentence_cn: 首先，他开列了一张长长的单子，上面列了所有禁吃的食物。
data.Sentence: First of all, he wrote out a long list of all the foods which were forbidden.

data.Sentence_cn: 这张单子上的大多数食物都是休喜欢吃的：黄油、土豆、米饭、啤酒、牛奶、巧克力和糖果。
data.Sentence: The list included most of the things Hugh loves: butter, potatoes, rice, beer, milk, chocolate, and sweets.

data.Sentence_cn: 昨天我去看望了他。我按响了门铃，当看到休仍和往常一样胖时，我并不感到惊奇。
data.Sentence: Yesterday I paid him a visit. I rang the bell and was not surprised to see that Hugh was still as fat as ever.

data.Sentence_cn: 他把我领进屋，慌忙把一个大包藏到了桌子下面。
data.Sentence: He led me into his room and hurriedly hid a large parcel under his desk.
It was obvious that he was very embarrassed.

data.Sentence_cn: 当我问他正干什么时，他内疚地笑了，然后把那个大包拿到了桌上。
data.Sentence: When I asked him what he was doing, he smiled guiltily and then put the parcel on the desk.

data.Sentence_cn: 他解释说，他的饮食控制得太严格了，以致不得不偶尔奖赏自己一下。
data.Sentence: He explained that his diet was so strict that he had to reward himself occasionally.

data.Sentence_cn: 接着他给我看了包里的东西。
data.Sentence: Then he showed me the contents of the parcel.

data.Sentence_cn: 里面装了5大块巧克力和3袋糖果！
data.Sentence: It contained five large bars of chocolate and three bags of sweets!
